email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. I can offer a starting freight rate of $52.50 per metric ton. Please let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the offer. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit high for us. Would you consider $50.00 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear John, Thanks for your response. I can lower the freight rate to $51.25 per metric ton, but that's the best I can do. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Thanks for the revised offer. We can agree to $51.25 per metric ton. Please confirm the laycan and demurrage rate. Also, can you send over the full vessel details? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear John, Great to hear that. The laycan remains 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is confirmed at $15,000 per day, pro rata. I've attached the full vessel details for your review. Please let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, Everything looks good. We can proceed with the MV Ocean Star at $51.25 per metric ton. Please send over the contract for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Dear John, Perfect. I'll have the contract sent over shortly. Thanks for your cooperation, and looking forward to working with you on this shipment. Best regards, Sarah
